name: Dormouse Dungeon
description:
Real-time dungeon crawling featuring a cute rodent hero, collect keys to unlock deeper levels and make your escape! This release contains a total of 9 single-screen stages and shouldn't take more than 5 minutes to clear.

Created between the hours of 10pm and 2am over two weeks for My First Game Jam: Winter 2021.  If you enjoy it or would like to support further development, consider donating! Thanks a bunch!

Controls:
Gamepad:

  • Movement - Left-analogue stick
  • Attack - A button
  • Dash - X button

Keyboard:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Attack - X
  • Dash - C

Note: The game will default to game pad controls if it detects that one is connected.

Credits:

Art & code by Gannets

Music by Kubian

Following HeartBeast's "Make an RPG" tutorial.

SFX made in ChipTone

Made in GameMaker Studio 1.4
